text: The Men's 60 m wheelchair 1A was one of the events held in Athletics at the 1972 Summer Paralympics in Heidelberg. There were 17 competitors in the heat; 5 made it into the final. Jan Erik Stenberg of Norway won the gold medal. ==Results== ===Heats=== {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center;" !Rank !!Athlete !! title: Athletics at the 1972 Summer Paralympics – Men's 60 metres wheelchair 1A
